text:
Company Background:
Hoover, Patel and Fernandez is a leading food service company with a reputation for excellence in delivering top-tier dining experiences. We pride ourselves on our diverse and inclusive workplace culture, where everyone feels valued and respected.

Job Type:
Full-time

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Food Service Manager to oversee our dining operations. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in food service management, a passion for customer service, and the ability to lead a diverse team.

Responsibilities:
- Manage daily operations of the food service department.
- Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations.
- Train and supervise staff, promoting a respectful and inclusive workplace.
- Oversee inventory management and procurement.
- Develop and implement cost control measures.
- Maintain high standards of food quality and customer satisfaction.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Management or related field.
- Minimum of 5 years experience in food service management.
- Strong leadership and communication skills.
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
- Commitment to inclusivity and respect for all team members regardless of sexual orientation or gender identity.

Perks and Benefits:
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Paid time off and holidays.
- Retirement plan with company match.
- Professional development opportunities.
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from USD 55,000 to USD 70,000, based on your experience and skills.

Equal Opportunity Employer:
Hoover, Patel and Fernandez is an equal opportunity employer. We welcome people of all sexual orientations and support and celebrate all forms of family structures. We prioritize creating a culture where everyone feels respected and included, providing a respectful and inclusive workplace for LGBTQIA individuals.
